title: On an amusing fact...
content:
... which is possibly not even that amusing, unless you have absolutely no sense of humour (like me).
The date and time of this post, in YY, DD/MM; hh:mm:ss format, with a 24 hour clock, and provided that scheduled posting works as it should, will be 10, 11/12; 13:14:15. OK. I'm sorry. That is certainly not amusing. If it was worth your interest (which it probably isn't) I suppose I could have called it interesting.
